channel.title: My Old server release (2008) DELTA
channel.description:
[b]Server Infos:[/b]
7 Waves for firecape, Prayer Works, Need Prayer To Kill Jad..and other hard monsters... Bounty Hunter, 3 portals for each group of Combat Levels (Low,Mid,High) With BH Skull When You attack someone You need rope to get to Kq.. Assault Mi****me.. With Saradomin Wizards dds and sara strike Fight Caves Tele Thing All Skillcapes With Good Emotes (Use the skillcape emote pic) Started On A vampire Quest... 80% Of Skilling (Fm, Wc, Runecrafting, Cooking, Fishing, etc) Gfx of Weapons Specs Fixed All Skillcapes with good emotes. Dharok Actually Kicks Ass Liek Battlescape Isle..(Max damage with 1 hp so far is 139) Darkbow Hits Twice Zamorak GodSword hits with spec and barrage and poisons and heals.. Guthan Heals.. Interesting KBD.. 2h and Shield Kinda Fixed Saradomin Sword hits twice Gmaul is instant.. Shops Are Balanced.. Running Energy Charges... Macro Detection Elemental Staffs Actually Work (Inf Runes for the element of staff) Dupes Fixed Log Out timer Game Times Set Basic Pest Control Ring of Recoil, vengance, and other rebounding things Dragon Fire Shield Spec Mage and Range Work lulz.. Has Working Chivalry.. Good Welcome Interface You can have an economy Chatlog Tradelog Kicklog ClickingLog Lawl no Anti Leech, Treat it with respect tho >.> Only One Thing.. The Combat Needed for Bounty Hunter, you might have to fix that.. Wild Is Techtically Disabled Only Pk at Bh.. You can activate it again I guess..
[b]Somes Commands:[/b]
Player: :: starter (you can only use once) :: help :: gettime Mod+: :: kick :: mute Admin+: :: ban :: tele Owner: :: pickup :: item :: gfxz :: interface :: emote :: unban :: demote :: undead :: dead :: xteleall :: xteletome :: xteleto :: notedbarrows :: runes :: veng
[b]Pictures:[/b] [img]http://i203.photobucket.com/albums/aa146/amyrockz101/dlc.jpg[/img] [img]http://i203.photobucket.com/albums/aa146/amyrockz101/dlassault.jpg[/img] [img]http://i203.photobucket.com/albums/aa146/amyrockz101/dlhorror.png[/img] [img]http://i203.photobucket.com/albums/aa146/amyrockz101/dlag.jpg[/img] [img]http://i203.photobucket.com/albums/aa146/amyrockz101/dlbh.jpg[/img] [img]http://i203.photobucket.com/albums/aa146/amyrockz101/dlbmg.png[/img] [img]http://i203.photobucket.com/albums/aa146/amyrockz101/dldds.jpg[/img] [img]http://i203.photobucket.com/albums/aa146/amyrockz101/dlfightcaves.jpg[/img] [img]http://i203.photobucket.com/albums/aa146/amyrockz101/dlss.jpg[/img] [img]http://i203.photobucket.com/albums/aa146/amyrockz101/dlfc.png[/img] [b]Download Links:[/b] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?gzutmtretmy]http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?gzutmtretmy[/url]

item.title: My Old server release (2008) DELTA
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

The gameframe is terrible looking to be honest, however, it’s something new, so I guess I’m complaining half-half. Other than that, it’s nice to see that we still have some Deltas hanging around.

Read full topic

item.title: My Old server release (2008) DELTA
item.dc:creator: @thuglife98 thuglife98
item.description:
@thuglife98 wrote:

[quote=“KroniKz_, post:7, topic:444668”][quote author=thuglife98 link=topic=547353.msg4013013#msg4013013 date=1339380416]

Kewl shit is kewl.

thx, also, i’m not asking for it but i hope i’ll get some rep out of this :S
[/quote]
Ok, sorry i won’t also, thx for positive feedback
that was a turn off…

anyways, i like it. Dont ask for rep though, asking for rep honestly gets you de-repped. lol ive seen some funny threads :rolleyes:

cool release[/quote]

Read full topic
